moderation__confirm_report_provide_detai: Can you provide extra details that might be relevant to the report?
moderation__confirm_report_provide_happe:
- Your report will be submitted anonymously. 
- If you are reporting a post or comment, the report will be sent to the Okuna staff and the community moderators if applicable and the post will be hidden from your feed. 
- If you are reporting an account or community, it will be sent to the Okuna staff. 
- We'll review it, if approved, content will be deleted and penalties delivered to the people involved ranging from a temporary suspension to deletion of the account depending on the severity of the transgression. 
- If the report is found to be made in an attempt to damage the reputation of another member or community in the platform with no infringement of the stated reason, penalties will be applied to you.
moderation__update_description_report_hi: e.g. The report item was found to...

user__invite_someone_message:
Hey, I'd like to invite you to Okuna.

For Apple, first, download the TestFlight app on iTunes ({testFlightLink}) and then download the Okuna app ({iosLink})

For Android, download it from the Play store ({androidLink}).

Second, paste this personalised invite link in the 'Sign up' form in the Okuna App: {inviteLink}
